product_name: Capita Jess Kimura Pro Snowboard - Women's - 2014/2015
long_description: Redesigned from the ground up, the women's Jess Kimura Pro board reflects the durability and maneuverability pro riders and progressing amateurs alike demand for freestyle fun all season long.
